ramen.name: Hakubaku 9.5oz Organic Japanese Noodles For Ramen
ramen.desc: Best Overall: Japanese ramen noodles, natural ingredients verified by USDA and Kosher, cooking instructions on the package.

ramen.name: Maruchan Soy-Sauce Flavor Noodles For Ramen
ramen.desc: Best Budget: Noodles made of wheat flour, soy sauce flavor, low price, quick to cook.

ramen.name: Ichiran Tonkotsu-Flavored Noodles For Ramen
ramen.desc: Best Tonkotsu Ramen: Hakata-style tonkotsu ramen with firm noodles, Ichiran signature red spicy sauce, Japan-imported product.

ramen.name: Annie Chun's Shoyu-Flavored Noodles For Ramen
ramen.desc: Best Shoyu Ramen: American product, soy sauce soup with different frozen toppings, vegan-friendly, microwave-safe package.

ramen.name: Sapporo Ichiban 3.6oz Shio-Flavored Noodles For Ramen
ramen.desc: Best Shio Ramen: Japanese instant noodles with salt-flavored broth, a packet of sesames attached, no trans fat.

ramen.name: Nissin RAOH Miso-Flavored Noodles For Ramen
ramen.desc: Best Instant Noodles/Best Miso Ramen: Instant noodles with premium quality, triple-layer noodles, broth full of umami

ramen.name: Hime 25.4oz Japanese Noodles For Ramen
ramen.desc: Best Air-Dried Ramen Noodles: Japanese ramen noodles from wheat flour, thick and chewy, large quantity.

ramen.name: Sun Noodles 10oz Kaedama Noodles For Ramen
ramen.desc: Best Fresh Noodles: Fresh handmade noodles; not containing dairy products, artificial colors, and preservatives; affordable cost; can be refrigerated or frozen.

ramen.name: Ocean's Halo 8.4oz Organic Noodles For Ramen
ramen.desc: Best Organic Ramen: Air-dried noodles verified by USDA, Vegan-friendly, no trans fat and saturated fat

ramen.name: Lotus Foods Organic Millet & Brown Rice Noodles For Ramen
ramen.desc: Best Healthy Option: Noodles made of millet and brown rice, non-GMO, gluten-free, low sodium and MSG content
